member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive
member.summary: A FEZtive module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.Initialize(System.Int32)
member.param: The number of leds. Each strip contains 80.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.SetAll(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.Color)
member.summary: Sets all LEDs to the specified color.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.SetAll(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.Color[])
member.summary: Sets all LEDs to the specified colors.
member.param: The array to set every LED to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.SetLED(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.Color,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the specified LED to the specified color.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.FEZtive.Redraw
member.summary: Redraws all of the colors. Only to be used after a change was made to the Color array.
